pageTitle: EDGE OF TOMORROW | British Board of Film Classification
textBeforeTable: Trailer Related work 2D Remarks CFJ32118 Registration number CFF307393 BBFC reference 10197+0 Approved footage 113m 18s Submitted run time English Main language 01/05/2014 Classified date(s) Warner Brothers Entertainment UK Ltd Distributor(s) 2014 Year 2D Title Information EDGE OF TOMORROW Title Details The film also contains mild sex references and comic buttock nudity. There is one use of strong language ('f**k') and milder terms including 'bitch', 'bastard' and 'son of a bitch'. Language There is plenty of moderate threat, as soldiers face alien attacks, but the focus of the film is on the action and on overcoming the threat. Threat There is sight of tentacled aliens being shot, hacked and blown up. Occasional streaks of blood are seen on faces, and a man is seen bleeding after being attacked. However, there is
